fields.name: Identity
fields.description: User assigned identity to use to authenticate to customer's key vault. If not provided Managed Service Identity will be used.

fields.name: KeyName
fields.description: The name of the key in Azure Key Vault to use as Customer Managed Key.

fields.name: KeyVersion
fields.description: The version of the key used for CMK. If not provided, latest version will be used.

fields.name: VaultBaseUrl
fields.description: The url of the Azure Key Vault used for CMK.
